attributes.action: To Save Telford Town Park from development
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Telford Town Park has and continues to provide great enjoyment to hundreds of thousands of people throughout the West Midlands, many of whom do not have a garden.

Telford Town Park is under threat from adverse development because of a fashion to live in Town Centres.

Telford Town Park has been the subject of political boundary shifts, taking any say away from the residents and the wildlife.

The Residents of the West Midlands, who benefit from the peace, serenity, views of nature want our Town Park boundaries re-instated to their correct location, the Town Park to receive adequate mantenance, but to be free from development.  

We do not want the use of £30 million of public money used to benefit the private sector as well as loosing our Town Park.
